metadata.title: Microscope Kit, 100X Portable Handheld Microscope with 2 LED Lights, Mini Pocket Microscope for Jewelry Antique Coins Stamps, Leather Pouch
features: PROFESSIONAL DESIGN: This 100X microscope makes it easy to examine blood samples, bugs, and anything else that's worthy of a closer look. And the magnification can be adjustable to meet your needs.
2 LED LIGHTS: This electronic microscope has built-in 2 LED lights, which can provide bright and clear image even at any dim conditions. Along with a rubberized eyepiece for comfortable viewing.
COMPACT AND PORTABLE: The microscope kit includes 1 x mini 100x microscope and 1 x storage pouch. The weight of this mini microscope is approximately 46g/1.6oz, lightweight and portable.
WIDE APPLICATION: This coin microscope is widely suitable for inspection of tiny objects, including gems, diamonds, jewellery, coins, stamps, antiques, even computer parts and electronics, etc.

QUALITY SUPPORT: A wonderful choice for you. If you have any questions with your microscope for adults and kids, please contact us, we will contact you within 24 hours and provide a complete solution.
description: Specification: Product multiplier:100X Battery model :3* LR927 button batteries (not included) Light source: 2 LED lights Weight: Approx.46g/1.6oz
1 x mini 100x microscope (batteries not included) 1 x pouch
